All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
AutoCodeGeneration
AutoCodeGeneration will automatically create a code for student randomly.
BarChartExcel
BarChartExcel will create a bar chart base the table which uses to count the number of student having the same year of birth
ComponentExcel
ComponentExcel uses to create style for cell and main border of table and graph in the List Student Sheet and the Chart Sheet use Singleton Pattern to get instance
DataDemo
DataDemo will create a demo dataset which help to describe more clearly Excel file at the list Student Sheet and Graph Sheet.
ErrorMessageConstant
Error Message will show content of mistakes from the value
ExcelController
ExcelController will get the request from client to create Excel file consist of List Student Sheet and Graph Sheet
ExcelModel
ExcelModel will create model to contain the information of Excel file
GraphExcelValueConstant
GraphExcelValueConstant will hold the constant variable of Graph Sheet
ListStudentTable
ListStudentTable will create table, bind value to cell and draw main border which cover whole List Student Sheet at the List Student Sheet
Main
run application
ManagementStudentController
ManagementController will get the request and feedback the result with action: addStudent action-add student to database show action- show all student in the database Exit action- exit program checkValueStudent- check the right form of information before add to student model
Screen
Screen: common information which is used to show for client, such as: options and error messages
Student
Model of Student Information
StudentStorageService
Student Storage use to save the information of student
StudentValueConstant
constant value for student information
TableExcelValueConstant
TableExcelValueConstant will hold the constant variable of List Student Sheet
